#   DuckDuckBot is a web crawler / spider for DuckDuckGo. DuckDuckBot's job is to constantly 
#   crawl websites on the internet which are used to populate DuckDuckGo's search results
#   through the action of "web crawling".
#
#   A web crawler, or spider, is a type of bot that is typically operated by search
#   engines like DuckDuckGo, Google and Bing. Their purpose is to index the content of websites
#   all across the Internet so that those websites can appear in search engine results.
#
#   The crawler's user agent will appear as DuckDuckBot/1.1; (+http://duckduckgo.com/duckduckbot.html)
#
#   You should use this ipset if you do not wish for DuckDuckGo to be able to crawl
#   your server.
